metadata.title: CVE-2024-35908 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:tls: get psock ref after taking rxlock to avoid leakAt the start of tls_sw_recvmsg, we take a reference on the psock, andthen call tls_rx_reader_lock. If that fails, we return directlywithout releasing the reference.Instead of adding a new label, just take the reference after lockinghas succeeded, since we don't need it before.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
